{{title|1=operator==&lt;small&gt;(std::philox_engine)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/philox_engine/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|1=
friend bool operator==( const philox_engine&amp; lhs, const philox_engine&amp; rhs );
}}

Compares two pseudo-random number engines. Two engines are equal, if their internal states are equivalent, that is, if they would generate equivalent values for any number of calls of {{c|operator()}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{c/core|decltype(*this)}}}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|engines to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the engines are equal, {{c|false}} otherwise.
